name: Comb Finance
intro: A suite of financial products built on Fantom
introduce: COMB is a protocol aimed towards establishing a suite of financial products built on top of the Fantom blockchain. Users can stake their SpiritSwap, SpookySwap, and Beethoven-x LP tokens on pools page and earn the protocol's native token, COMB, as a reward. Users can also stake their LP tokens in its vaults, strategies that maximize the capital efficiency of incentives earn from LP tokens.
